name: Jin Sakai
title: The Ghost
description: The last surviving samurai of Clan Sakai. Forced to abandon his code to save his home, he becomes the Ghost of Tsushima.

name: Lord Shimura
title: Jito of Tsushima
description: Jin's uncle and father figure. A strict adherent to the samurai code of bushido, he leads the defense against the Mongol invasion.

name: Yuna
title: The Thief
description: A resourceful thief who saves Jin's life. She teaches him the ways of the Ghost and becomes his most trusted ally.

name: Lady Masako
title: Adachi Matriarch
description: The last survivor of Clan Adachi. Consumed by vengeance against those who betrayed data slaughtered her family.

name: Sensei Ishikawa
title: The Master Archer
description: A legendary but arrogant archer. He mentors Jin in the way of the bow while hunting his wayward student, Tomoe.

name: Kenji
title: The Sake Merchant
description: A merchant with questionable schemes but a good heart. Often gets Jin into trouble while trying to help.

name: Khotun Khan
title: The Invader
description: Cousin of Kublai Khan. A brilliant and ruthless tactician who studies his enemies to destroy them.
